name: Run 3D
description:
Run 3D is a fun project i am making and will try and make it be on iOS and Android so stay tuned! run 3D has lots of controls here the are:

to grapple press (Left Click on platforms)

to jump press (Space)

 to move press (W,A,S,D)

to restart press (R)

to go to next level press (n)

to crouch press (ctrl)

All Thanks To Dani for movement/grapple code
